body_html:
Hi, krak3nnn, thanks for your help.
Today, I have got a compiled version of tensorflow1.3, which could run the benchmark with NHWC data format. So I think during the "./configure" step, could we add some options to solve this probem?

body:
Hi, krak3nnn, thanks for your help. 
Today, I have got a compiled version of tensorflow1.3, which could run the benchmark with NHWC data format. So I think during the "./configure" step, could we add some options to solve this probem?
